## üìä Our Edge

ProPlotFits combines:

- **Rolling performance metrics** (L3, L5 games) 
- **Four Factors analysis** (eFG%, TOV%, ORB%, FT Rate)
- **Pace-adjusted efficiency ratings**
- **KenPom adjusted metrics** (coming soon in v2.0)
- **Machine learning models** trained on 2+ seasons of data

Our Gradient Boosting (spreads), Random Forest (totals), and Logistic Regression (win probability) models are backtested and validated against historical performance.
